title: Hour 2 - NBA's Player Empowerment Era May Be Dead
itunes:title: Hour 2 - NBA's Player Empowerment Era May Be Dead
description:
Dan Patrick explains why Kevin Durant remaining with the Brooklyn Nets may signify a huge shift in the NBA. Dan discusses Nick Saban's huge extension with Alabama and compares it to other head coach salaries across the nation. Dan reacts to Fernando Tatis Jr. addressing the media for the first time since his PED suspension.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
